title: New insights into the role of aging in heart failure

title_detail.value: New insights into the role of aging in heart failure

summary: Researchers have found that activity of an important signaling pathway increases with aging and with heart failure and that inhibiting that pathway can improve cardiac function in mouse models.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have found that activity of an important signaling pathway increases with aging and with heart failure and that inhibiting that pathway can improve cardiac function in mouse models.
